data.title: VIS PRODUCTIONS
data.meta_description:
VIS PRODUCTIONS | 200 followers on LinkedIn. Entertainment for Events, TV, Gala, Parks & Resorts | Film/Photography for TV, Commercial, SoMe & Music Videos | VIS PRODUCTIONS is an entertainment & film production company founded in 2016, that have created many forms of entertainment across both current and emerging media platforms, nonetheless, on live stages. We do Ice shows, musicals & children‚Äôs shows, as well as a variety of productions for film, TV, music and photography - VIS does it all. 

A vast team of talented individuals that takes on the VIS spirit and delivers the "WOW" factor in everything we do!

Three weeks ago we had the honor to join the Amaze Festival at Sm√∂gen!! üî• We brought two of our performers in stunning LED-dresses & bedazzling mirror-suits to pump up the VIP section, however, ended up on stage with Otto Knows! Our interactive performers demonstrated how powerful immersive experiences can drive attendee engagement and leave a lasting impression. Once again thank you Amaze Festival for having us - we look forward to future collaborations! üíõ ‚Äî‚Äî If you're planning events this fall or winter, now is the time to think beyond traditional formats and incorporate elements that captivate and inspire. We specialize in creating unique, audience-focused experiences that elevate your event to the next level. üìß Info@visproductions.se üì∏ Photos by VIS PRODUCTIONS __________________________________________ #EventEntertainment #FestivalPlanning #EngagementEntertainment #LEDDress

üåü Wrapping Up a Fantastic Week Across Four Premier Parks! üåü As we head into the weekend, we are proud to reflect on the remarkable experiences we've shared so far at Kongeparken, Furuviksparken, Gr√∂na Lunds Tivoli, and Skara Sommarland. We at VIS Productions are honored to collaborate with these esteemed venues to provide exceptional entertainment for families and visitors. We extend our heartfelt thanks to our partners, community and the enthusiastic audiences who have made this summer so memorable to all of us. As we continue this summer season, we look forward to further enriching the entertainment experience for guests and creating more magical moments. Wishing everyone a fantastic weekend ahead! üíõ üì∏ Photos by VIS PRODUCTIONS Victor Sj√∂lin __________________________________________________ #ParkEntertainment #ChildrensEntertainment #Kongeparken #Furuviksparken #Gr√∂naLund #SkaraSommarland #EntertainmentProduction #SummerEvents #FamilyFun #CreativeEntertainment

Thrilled to announce that VIS Productions has expanded internationally to Kongeparken in Norway! üåç‚ú® Two weeks ago, we embarked on our first collaboration with a theme park outside of Sweden. Our team introduced seven new park characters and a dynamic pop-up dance show, which have been met with an overwhelmingly positive reception. Sukke, in particular, has quickly become a fan favorite! We extend our sincere gratitude to Kongeparken for entrusting us with this project. We are deeply appreciative of the opportunity to bring joy and entertainment all the way from Sweden to Norway! üá∏üá™üá≥üá¥ Please take a moment to view our photos from the premiere and follow us on TikTok for more updates!üåü Photos by VIS PRODUCTIONS Gustav H√∂gmo ______________________________________________________ #VISProductions #Kongeparken #AmusementParks #ParkEntertainment #CharacterDevelopment #LiveEntertainment #ParkCharacters #ProductionCompany

VIS Productions had the opportunity to entertain some cowboys at 3 Sverige Wild West Summer Party the other week! The evening featured an interactive line dance with tutorials and ended with a mesmerizing fire show! The participation from the attendees were truly remarkable, contributing to the event's overall success! We sincerely thank 3 Sverige for entrusting us with this event and extend our gratitude to everyone involved for making it a resounding success. Here are some highlights from this remarkable evening! üì∏ Photos by VIS PRODUCTIONS ‚Äî‚Äî We offer tailored entertainment for your event & documentation of it. Get in touch with us today! ________________________________________ #VISProductions #CorporateEvents #EventEntertainment #EventPhotos #Eventdesign

We at VIS Productions are at a new park this summer: Skara Sommarland and boy do we have a show for you! An action-filled musical for the whole family loaded to the brim with acrobatics, stunts, song, dance and a whole lot of audience participation! I wrote the script and music for it and directed it and I‚Äôm really proud of this one! No matter the age, if you‚Äôre going by the park this summer you should check it out! Expedition X: The Lost Heart of the Jungle is playing twice a day all summer! Don‚Äôt miss it!

WE CONQUERED TERRA OLTRE AND MADE IT RISE AGAIN! Last week 200 brave Partners & Distributors accepted the task to join the adventure to seek for Terra Oltre: The land beyond, and with their knowledge and energy make it rise again. Go Beyond - Terra Oltre is by far one of the most challenging and rewarding experiences we have ever done with a strong storytelling theme from old to new and beyond. The guests got to uncover 7 different districts with: THE CLOCK TOWER: Legacy, Productivity, Future DISTRIBUTION SQUARE: Network, Channel First THE WORKSHOP: Programs, Tools MARKETING FOREST: Storytelling, AI, Data GARDEN OF GOOD: ESG story STORAGE CHAMBER: Datacenter, Backup TECHNOLOGY DISTRICT: Client Devices, AI, DnCP all paired with a Dell Technologies story and a team of wise custodians. Besides this the group got to listen to inspirational keynotes by David JP Phillips David Spruyt Julie Rosendal and insightful breakouts and group days. Rest of the time in Terra Oltre was spent on training & wellness, street art sessions, culinary classes, networking, 1:1 future talks in a Delorean, local farmers market and relaxation. CONGRATULATIONS TO: Henri L√∂fberg TD SYNNEX who walked home with $10 000 for a marketing campaign after pitching for the dragons in TERRA OLTRE DEN. All this with carefully carved out with a visually stimulated animation & music spanning from Opera to EDM to open all senses and make people connect. Terra Oltre is almost impossible to describe in pictures and words, but we truly hope that all guests felt how magic this experience was. BIG THANK YOU TO OUR BRILLIANT TEAM! Main Program sponsor: Intel Corporation Miroslaw Osiecki Main Agency: Onemotion IMC Elin Brevitz Emmelie Johansson Nathalie Werme Michelle Alm Elin Josefsson Mats Mileblad Tomasz Pieniazek Digital Agency: The Old Shanghai Firecracker Factory Jane Hynes Francesco Leonardi Tech Agency / Visual Appearance / run of show: BehindLive AB Sebastian Sj√∂str√∂m Jonathan Sj√∂str√∂m Kevin Romerdal Performance Team: VIS PRODUCTIONS & Robert Rochowiak (aka Caesar) Anders Graae Lauritzen Venue / Local Agency The Workation Village Campfire Company Sanida Mujakovic Johannes Hoyos Elisa Zecchin Leo Hoyos Francesca Sapey Special Thank to owner & architect Luca Garrone Epic Photos: Jonathan Sj√∂str√∂m Studjo AB Mood Manager: Jonny Saliba And last but not least thank you to the 27 Distributors and all colleagues at Dell Technologies associated with Go Beyond - The Rise of Terra Oltre!

Tonight we have the pleasure of entertaining people at two different events in Stockholm - one of them with 3 Sverige another one together with Ciceron Group for one of their clients! üåü We are so incredibly grateful to work with Ciceron Group once again. Thank you for another opportunity to deliver high end entertainment for your clients! - Make sure to follow us on Instagram & watch our story to see what we‚Äôre up to in real time! üòéüî• üì∏ Photo by VIS Productions from an event with Red Bull. _________________________________________ #EventEntertainment #Fireshow #FireBreather #EventInspiration #EntertainmentCompany #ProductionCompany #VISProductions

We are still riding the wave of excitement from the premiere of our brand new action live show at Skara Sommarland this past weekend! üåüüé≠ This event marks our first collaboration with Skara Sommarland, and it was a true testament to our team's hard work, creativity, and dedication. ‚ÄúExpedition X Lost Heart of The Jungle‚Äù was highly appreciated among people of all ages and we are so grateful for the opportunity! We are so incredibly proud of our writers, musicians, costume designers, prop makers, choreographers, last but not least, performers ‚Äì all of you brought this spectacle to life! ü™Ñ Check out some of the highlights from the premiere and join us in celebrating this incredible achievement. Stay tuned for more updates and behind-the-scenes glimpses as we continue this exciting journey! üöÄ _____________________________ #PremiereWeekend #LiveShow #SkaraSommarland #FamilyShow #ProductionCompany #EntertainmentIndustry
